name: PayChangu Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: PayChangu

sections.description:
Accept Credit card, Debit card, Airtel Money and TNM Mpamba.

Receive money from anyone with Our Borderless Payment Collection Platform. Payout straight to your bank account or mobile money.

Signup for an account here

PayChangu API (External Service)

This plugin uses PayChangu API to process WooCommerce payments via PayChangu Payment Gateway.

  1. https://api.paychangu.com/payment -> Send payment request with payment data to PayChangu
  2. https://api.paychangu.com/verify-payment -> Get payment results from PayChangu

Please refer to PayChangu Terms and Conditions here, and Paychangu Privacy Policy here.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. Login to your WordPress Dashboard.
  2. Click on “Plugins > Add New” from the left menu.
  3. In the search box type PayChangu Gateway for Woocommerce.
  4. Click on Install Now on PayChangu Gateway for Woocommerce to install the plugin on your site.
  5. Confirm the installation.
  6. Activate the plugin.
  7. Click on “WooCommerce > Settings” from the left menu and click the “Payments” tab.
  8. Click on the PayChangu link from the available Checkout Options
  9. Configure your PayChangu settings accordingly.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin zip file.
  2. Login to your WordPress Admin. Click on “Plugins > Add New” from the left menu.
  3. Click on the “Upload” option, then click “Choose File” to select the zip file you downloaded. Click “OK” and “Install Now” to complete the installation.
  4. Activate the plugin.
  5. Click on “WooCommerce > Settings” from the left menu and click the “Payments” tab.
  6. Click on the PayChangu link from the available Checkout Options
  7. Configure your PayChangu settings accordingly.
    For FTP manual installation, check here.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial version

1.1.0

  • Update to support the new API version
